nhc_headline: ...LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING AND GUSTY WINDS ONGOING ACROSS  PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN NORTH CAROLINA...
summary:
...LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING AND GUSTY WINDS ONGOING ACROSS  PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN NORTH CAROLINA...
 As of 2:00 PM EDT Mon Sep 16
 the center of Eight was located near 33.1, -78.3
 with movement NNW at 5 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
